data.eml:eml: Biatoraalnetorum (Ramalinaceae, Lecanorales), a new lichen species from western North America

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ekman, Stefan, Tonsberg, Tor (2019): Biatoraalnetorum (Ramalinaceae, Lecanorales), a new lichen species from western North America. MycoKeys 48: 55-65, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.48.33001, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.48.33001
